plugin.name: dynamic-domain-class
plugin.author: Lim Chee Kin
plugin.title: Grails Dynamic Domain Class Plugin - Create domain class on-the-fly
plugin.description:
The Dynamic Domain Class plugin enabled Grails application to create domain class dynamically when application is running.
* Project Site and Documentation: http://code.google.com/p/grails-dynamic-domain-class-plugin/ * Support: http://code.google.com/p/grails-dynamic-domain-class-plugin/issues/list * Discussion Forum: http://groups.google.com/group/grails-dynamic-domain-class-plugin
